name: node-win-file-attrib
description: Windows File Attribute Query And Update Wrapper

scripts.build: node-gyp build && tsc && npm run pretty
scripts.pretty: prettier --write binding.gyp --parser json && npm run pretty-code
scripts.pretty-code: prettier -u --write src/**/*.ts dist/**/*.js dist/**/*.ts example/**/* && clang-format -i src/win32/*
